name: Liron Himbert Portfolio
title: Liron Himbert - Software Engineer | AI & Backend Specialist
description: Software Engineer specialized in backend, full-stack, and AI-driven systems. Expert in LangGraph, MCP, and LLM agentic development with strong focus on cybersecurity and distributed architectures.

author.name: Liron Himbert
author.bio: Software Engineer specialized in backend, full-stack, and AI-driven systems, with hands-on experience in designing distributed architectures, microservices, and automation pipelines. Skilled in LangGraph, MCP, and LLM agentic development, with a strong foundation in Python, Node.js, and cloud-native technologies. Passionate about leveraging AI Agents to enhance cybersecurity, optimize processes, and build scalable, intelligent systems.
